alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 10:19AM CDT until April 15 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Merrill affecting Marathon and Lincoln Counties. For the Wisconsin River...including Merrill, Rothschild, Whiting Dam, Stevens Point...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wisconsin River at Merrill. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Several feet of water may be covering area parks and lowland in Merrill. Floodwaters reach the base of the river gauging station. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:10 AM CDT Monday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 13.3 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.0 feet on 04/02/1967. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
